items.title: Starmer and Glastonbury Condemn Bob Vylan’s Chant Against Israel’s Military
items.description: The band Bob Vylan led a crowd in a chant of “Death, death to the I.D.F.” while performing at Glastonbury, Britain’s biggest music festival.

items.title: Click, speak, move: These brain implants are poised to help people with disabilities
items.description: People who can no longer move or speak may soon have a new option: an implanted device that links their brain to a computer.

items.title: Taiwan’s President Takes on China, and His Opponents, in Speaking Tour
items.description: Lai Ching-te is ramping up his warnings about China’s threat to Taiwan. Critics say he is stoking divisions, and risking blowback from Beijing.

items.title: What We Know About the Idaho Shooting
items.description: The authorities said a gunman started a wildfire to lure firefighters, then ambushed them in a sniper attack.
